name: Daily-desktop-screenshots
description: This repository houses my daily desktop screenshots since I started on April 17th 2018. I intend to make this like one of those early YouTube videos where someone takes a picture of themself every day for over a decade and puts it into a time lapse 4 minute video.

name: BlazeOS_Userland
description: The file system and structure for the BlazeOS operating system project (Userland)

name: Learn-Desktop
description: A repository for showcasing my knowledge of the Desktop programming language, and continuing to learn the language.

name: SeansLifeArchive_Images_Daily-Desktop-Screenshots_Dump-Unprocessed
description: 🖼️🖥️📸️ An unprocessed dump of my Daily Desktop screenshot images.

name: 360Desktop
description: A next generation wallpaper engine that enables increased desktop interactivity, with classic image wallpapers, high quality video wallpapers, and even 360 degree VR wallpapers.
